alert.note: Alert for Adair (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 8:01PM CST until January 02 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN ADAIR COUNTY... At 800 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles south of Stilwell, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Stilwell... Adair State Park... Maryetta... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northwestern Arkansas...and northeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
